snippet.title: Mansion Mystery Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into 'Mansion Mystery,' an immersive VR puzzler. In a haunted mansion governed by real-world physics, ignite matches, shatter plates, and solve intricate puzzles. Will you unravel the secrets and escape or be trapped forever?

Try out the free demo or purchase the full version on Steam:
https://www.garagevr.co/mansionmystery_steam

Or, if you prefer the standalone version on Oculus:
https://www.garagevr.co/mansionmystery_oculus
